attributes.action: abolish the tv license and do not allow the broadcasting levy to be braught into use
attributes.additional_details:
i am calling for the TV licence to be abolished and for the planned broadcasting levy not to be brought into use.

i feel strongly that the government is betraying all its citizens by supporting the use of forced fees, levy's, fines and any payments by a company regardless of whether you want to use the companies service.
this is against our consumer rights.

not all people want to watch the BBC not all people want to watch TV.
every other country can watch BBC for free
we should all have the right not to financially back a company that for over a decade supported and aided child abusers, proven or not Jimmy Saviles job with the BBC put him in the position to be able to commit and get away with his numerous crimes against children and the infirm.

BBC should be made to make their service a pre-order service like any other Chanel. you order it they give you a box and you get a bill.
